egidio@egidiolatorraca.com

I am an artist. Each meal is a canvas. I paint with water, fire, and elemental ingredients of full passion. Sometimes, the seemingly easy is the most difficult. The greatst achievement is to create the most with the least.
CIAO

I’m Egidio Latoracca

I owe much to my father. He instilled in me a love for the basics, the foundations - of Italian cuisine such as pasta, figs, and olives. My innovation is to combine the classics with new tastes and textures. It is evolution.

I am blessed to hold a Master Chef of Italian Cuisine certification from the Academia Barilla of Parma and to have worked with some of the world’s greatest chefs around the world.

ABOUT THE CHEF
BREAKFAST

Seafood Promotion Spring

Eggs filled with praline Easter sea-themed fishes and shellfish. Original and mysterious creations that appear to have been carved, sculpted and hand crafted, evoking the delicate artisanal chocolate of the maker.

An original Egidio Latorraca creation

Press Articles

Graduated as Hotel and Restaurant Services Specialist and Food and Beverage Executive from Instituto Amerigo Vespucci Italy. I am often invited to share my experience in TV shows, magazines, and online publications. In my press you will find my media apperances without any order. I apolofize for the media that I ommit on my site.

VIEW ALL PRESS
SCALINI

Italian goes international

Bangkok is, naturally enough, best known for its Tai food with other Asian cuisines not far behind. But these days, European food - French or Italian - are booming, particulary when served with a twist.

SCALINI
